name: Devlight
tagline: Trusted partner in the era of digital innovation
description:
Devlight is a service company that develops various digital products for businesses. Our team comprises more than 70 people united under the idea of being inspired by innovation and technological challenge. While working on widening the clients' development horizons, employees of Devlight have no choice but to find remarkable ways to personal growth, professional progress and increasing rates of life satisfaction. 
Leading Ukrainian brands team up with Devlight to achieve rapid growth with the help of digital metamorphosis. Nova Poshta, OKKO, Epicentr, Portmone and many others are already with us. 
With the help of digitalization we open the true potential of the businesses in the modern world, facilitate their dynamic growth and deep involvement of the end customer. 
To our clients we offer to kick-start the digitalization by creating paramount digital products that are to convey the value of the business and be new means of communication and customer retention. Our assistance lets businesses develop a service of premium quality aiming at building new and not necessarily price-oriented value of the brand.
